cause.description:
This is a group set out to right the wrong we have believed since children. Dinosaurs aren't real and I don't believe in them. Everyone knows the Man invented Dinosaurs as a means to keep the black man out of the rural areas and instead in the over populated cities in the 1940's. It's another way of oppressing us all as a whole-- so the Man can have us to believe in something that doesn’t exist. No one ever finds a Bone in the US, and Fossils are not bones -they are rocks in the shape of bones and somehow these Scientist go over in the desert with a Make up brush and start brushing and supposedly find a bone... I give you all a challenge, go outside with a shovel and find one dinosaur bone, just one, you won't because they don't exist. All they do is have you too believe that one chip of a bone of a cow is some how the jaw of a T-rex, they say there are over 400 species of dinosaurs... that deserves a big...." COME ON"... so open the eyes of the people around you... just really think about it……of course these guys are going to carve out rocks to look like bones. Wouldn’t you if all you had to do for a job was travel and play in the dirt occasionally? These people have a stake in making you believe.... Open the eyes!
1. Dinosaurs are a Farce
2. The earth is only 6,000 and change years old
3. People digging with make up brushes can carve anything out of rock
cause.mission: To educate the world about the lies put forth to indoctorinate the public that the earth is 4.3 billion years old and dis prove the mans, association with dinosaurs
cause.name: I don't believe in dinosaurs
